Definition at line 155 of file example/PWRCU/BOD_LVD/ht32f5xxxx_01_it.c.

int main ( void  )

Main program.

Return values:
None
Note:
At this stage the microcontroller clock setting is already configured, this is done through SystemInit() function which is called from startup file (startup_ht32fxxxx.s) before branching to application main. To reconfigure the default setting of SystemInit() function, refer to system_ht32fxxxx.c file

Main program as following:

  • Init LED1, LED2 used to output state.
  • Enable RTC PCLK.
  • Wait till the backup domain could be accessed.
  • Enable NVIC LVD interrupt.
  • Enable BOD reset. For the BOD voltage, please refer to the datasheet.
  • Enable LVD and LVD interrupt. The LVD level is configured around 3.0V. The interrupt service routine will toggle LED2 till the VDD33 above 3.0V.
  • Toggle LED1 in an infinite loop.

Definition at line 69 of file example/PWRCU/BOD_LVD/main.c.
